com.augursystems.armi.demo

Class WorldClockService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.augursystems.armi.demo.WorldClockService

  • public class WorldClockService
extends java.lang.Object
    An ARMI service that will provide the current time in given time zones.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WorldClockService() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getTime(java.lang.String tz)
      Provides the current time in the given time zone.
      java.lang.String getTimes(java.lang.String... tzs)
      Provides the current time in the given time zone(s).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • WorldClockService

        public WorldClockService()

    • Method Detail

      • getTime

        public final java.lang.String getTime(java.lang.String tz)
        Provides the current time in the given time zone.
        Parameters:
        tz - A String representing a time zone
        Returns:
        a String containing the current time in the time zone given, terminated by end-of-line character(s), per O/S.

      • getTimes

        public final java.lang.String getTimes(java.lang.String... tzs)
        Provides the current time in the given time zone(s).
        Parameters:
        tzs - A variable number of String parameters representing time zones
        Returns:
        a String containing the current time in each time zone given, each terminated by end-of-line character(s), per O/S.
